name: Mallio Cart
description:
Christmas 🎄 shopping last minute on the very eve is never a good idea! And you’re not the only one who has had said idea.

https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/40/mallio-cart/

Made in 72 hours for Ludum Dare 40 by Ava Skoog. The theme was the more you have, the worse it is. 

Grab your trolley 🛒 and your shopping list 📝! It’s Christmas Eve and everyone’s desperate to get the last remaining stock before closing time in just two minutes! ⏰

Steer with WAD, look with mouse and click wares to pick ‘em up. Fill up your trolley and go pay!
